summary: Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017, that it is embarrassing for the United Nations that governments with egregious human rights records sit on the UN Human Rights Council.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017, that the United States pays 22 percent of the entire budget of the United Nations, despite being only one out of 193 countries in the organization.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017 that strong and independent nations should embrace their sovereignty to promote security, prosperity, and peace. He emphasized that diverse countries do not need to share the same cultures or systems of government, but they should respect the interests of their own people and the rights of other sovereign nations. Trump believes that strong, sovereign nations allow for cooperation, success, and the flourishing of individuals. He also stated that America does not seek to impose its way of life on others, but rather serves as an example for others to observe.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017, that it is time for all nations to work together to isolate the Kim regime in North Korea and confront the Iranian government, which he described as a corrupt dictatorship. He emphasized the need for denuclearization in North Korea and criticized Iran for using its resources to fund terrorism and destabilize the Middle East.
